AI Description: GNU is an extensive collection of free software, including an operating system kernel, utilities, programming languages, compilers, and more, designed to provide users with the freedom to run, study, share, and modify the software.

1. Free software philosophy 2. Extensive collection of tools and utilities 3. Operating system kernel 4. Programming languages and compilers
5. Community-driven development
